clinical_study.brief_title: Depot Naltrexone Treatment of Opioid Dependent Parolees
clinical_study.official_title: Depot Naltrexone Treatment of Opioid Dependent Parolees

brief_summary.textblock: This is an investigation involving the use of a long-acting, injectable form (depot) of naltrexone as a treatment for persons who have a history of opioid dependence, with up to 40 on parole/probation and 20 non-parolees. The test is a pilot study of up to 60 subjects treated with 6 months of depot naltrexone plus Psychosocial Treatment .

detailed_description.textblock: This is a two phase study. Phase 1 is complete and phase 2 is not yet recruiting.
